page.title: 03POPULATION
page.content: The population of Mere is 2,224 of which 321 are children under the age of eighteen. In the last year there have been 22 births and 18 deaths. It is sad to note that many of the old families of Mere are vanishing as widening horizons take younger people away. The main influx of new people are those in the 'retirement' bracket. However, with the continuing existence of family businesses and the farming community some of the old names are preserved e.g. Bristow, Burfitt, Burden, Chalke, Coward, Dodd, Doggrell,Hill, Mitchell, Norris, Rutter and White. Other older names remaining in Mere are Arney, Avery, Deverill, Doddington, Ford, Francis, Fricker, Gatehouse, Gray, Hooper, Howell, Hunt, Jukes, Lawley, Maidment, Mills, Pester, Pike, Snook, Standerwick.
